lead_paragraph: Kathleen Hersey won the 400-meter individual medley and Jessica Rodriguez took the 400 freestyle for the United States in the swimming competition at the Pan American Games yesterday in Rio de Janeiro.Shawn Johnson, the 15-year-old who won the women’s all-around gymnastics title Monday, won gold in the balance beam and uneven bars and a silver in the floor exercise. And Jason Turner won his second gold in shooting, winning the 10-meter air-pistol title.
